verses.name: Deuteronomy 30:11
verses.text: For this commandment which I command thee this day, it is not hidden from thee, neither is it far off.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 30:12
verses.text: It is not in heaven, that thou shouldest say, Who shall go up for us to heaven, and bring it unto us, that we may hear it, and do it?

verses.name: Deuteronomy 30:13
verses.text: Neither is it beyond the sea, that thou shouldest say, Who shall go over the sea for us, and bring it unto us, that we may hear it, and do it?
